## VFS.\_move() method

Moves/renames a file or directory within the same VFS. Implementation should avoid file copying and use metadata operations only.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected abstract _move(sourcePath: string, targetPath: string, options?: MoveOptions): Promise<void>;
```
